casebody.data:
IN RE J FERRANTI, Minor. SC: 157907-8
COA: 340117
340118 Supreme Court of Michigan. September 14, 2018

Order

On order of the Chief Justice, the motion of the Children's Law Section of the State Bar of Michigan to extend the time for filing a brief amicus curiae to October 11, 2018, is DENIED for the reason that the case is scheduled for oral argument on October 10, 2018.
